The NYU Lecture Series - 1978-79: "The Business Media: Ally, Analyst, Apologist or Antagonist?" with Bob Bartley, WSJ; Bob Flaherty, Forbes; and Prof. Irving Kristol, NYU. Reel I of II.
The NYU Lecture Series - 1978-79: "The Business Media: Ally, Analyst, Apologist or Antagonist?" with Bob Bartley, WSJ; Bob Flaherty, Forbes; and Prof. Irving Kristol, NYU. Reel I of II.
Housing annotation: The lecture series program is included with the tape."WNYU BDCST 3-5-79, 8-9 pm" marked on container label in red ink. From the Media 78 Conference.
Format: 1/4" Open Reel Audio, Duration: 32 min.
